title: Sleepless Knight
description: The Knight can't wait for her first camping trip! She and her horse Edward pack everything they need — including her beloved Teddy — and head out into the woods. But when it's time for bed, Teddy is nowhere to be found!A helpful rabbit thinks this "Teddy" sounds familiar, and sends the Knight off to a cave... but that's no teddy bear in that cave. That's a real bear!In this sweet, simple adventure, basic comics elements combine with the picture book format to create a picture book for the youngest of comics readers, and a fantastic introduction into the world of Adventures in Cartooning.
author: James Sturm
